title: 4th Sem ECE Syllabus
content: Can someone tell 4th sem ECE Syllabus

comments.body:
Linear Algebra 
Digital VLSI Design
Control Systems
Digital Communications
Principles of Digital Signal Processing
I still have PTSD from control systems
